tooltips.beatmap_path: Path to .osu file to autofill metadata, audio path, and output path, or use as reference
tooltips.title: Song title
tooltips.creator: Beatmap creator/mapper name
tooltips.tags: Tags for searching and categorizing, separated by spaces
tooltips.scroll_speed_ratio: Scroll speed ratio for mania and ctb 0-1
tooltips.lora_path: Path to folder or HuggingFace repository with LoRA weights and config. This can be used to tweak the style of the model beyond its usual capabilities.
tooltips.in_context_options: List of additional context to provide to the model
tooltips.descriptors: List of descriptors for style (1 click = include, 2 clicks = exclude)
tooltips.negative_descriptors: List of negative descriptors for style to avoid (1 click = include, 2 clicks = exclude)

models.v31: Mapperatorinator V31 (Slightly more accurate than V29)

options.export_osz_tooltip: Whether to export a .osz file containing the generated beatmap and audio file
options.add_to_beatmap_tooltip: Whether to merge the generated content with the reference beatmap
options.overwrite_reference_beatmap_tooltip: Whether to overwrite the reference beatmap file instead of creating a new file
options.super_timing_tooltip: Whether to use slow accurate variable BPM timing generator
options.enable_bf16_tooltip: Use BF16 precision for ~15% faster inference on Ampere+ GPUs (RTX 30xx/40xx)

progress.title: Progress
progress.initializing: Initializing process... This may take a moment.

success.settings_reset: All settings reset to default values

error.start_failed: Failed to start inference process. Check backend console.
error.validation_failed: Error validating paths. Check console for details.
error.audio_or_beatmap_required: Either 'Beatmap Path' or 'Audio Path' are required for running inference
error.output_or_beatmap_required: Either 'Output Path' or 'Beatmap Path' are required for running inference
error.browse_failed: Could not browse. Ensure the backend API is running.
error.connection_lost: Error: Connection to process stream lost.
error.file_not_found: Error: A required file was not found.
error.generation_error: There was an error while creating the beatmap. Check console/logs for details.
error.task_error: There was an error starting or executing the generation task.
error.config_invalid: Please select a valid JSON configuration file.
error.cancel_failed: Failed to send cancel request. Unknown error.
error.open_folder_failed: Failed to open folder via backend.
error.open_log_failed: Failed to open log file via backend.

confirm.reset_settings: Are you sure you want to reset all settings to default values? This cannot be undone.

links.open_folder: Click here to open the folder containing your map.
links.beatmap_created: Click Here to go to the created beatmap...

gimmick.label: gimmick
gimmick.tooltip: Focused on a single unique design or gameplay idea.

2B.label: 2B
2B.tooltip: Includes gameplay elements with two or more objects placed simultaneously.

slider only.label: slider only
slider only.tooltip: Restricts object choice to sliders only.

circle only.label: circle only
circle only.tooltip: Restricts object choice to circles only.

swing.label: swing
swing.tooltip: Uses 1/3, 1/6, and 1/12 snap divisors for most/all objects.

collab.label: collab
collab.tooltip: A map with two or more associated mappers.

megacollab.label: megacollab
megacollab.tooltip: A map with 8 or more associated mappers.

marathon.label: marathon
marathon.tooltip: A map with a drain time of over 5 minutes.

gungathon.label: gungathon
gungathon.tooltip: A map with a drain time of over 10 minutes.

multi-song.label: multi-song
multi-song.tooltip: Contains multiple songs within the audio.

variable timing.label: variable timing
variable timing.tooltip: Contains multiple timing points, usually for non-metronome songs.

time signatures.label: time signatures
time signatures.tooltip: Many changes or uncommon time signatures.

storyboard.label: storyboard
storyboard.tooltip: Contains a storyboard that enhances gameplay experience.

storyboard gimmick.label: storyboard gimmick
storyboard gimmick.tooltip: Uses storyboard elements that change how the map is played.

keysounds.label: keysounds
keysounds.tooltip: Uses various pitched hitsounds to create a melody.

download unavailable.label: download unavailable
download unavailable.tooltip: Cannot be downloaded from the osu! website.

custom skin.label: custom skin
custom skin.tooltip: Utilizes custom skin elements and graphics.

featured artist.label: featured artist
featured artist.tooltip: Features song(s) from osu!'s Featured Artist listing.

custom song.label: custom song
custom song.tooltip: Maps a song made specifically for the map.

geometric.label: geometric
geometric.tooltip: Incorporates geometric shapes within the design.

grid snap.label: grid snap
grid snap.tooltip: Objects are placed along a square grid.

hexgrid.label: hexgrid
hexgrid.tooltip: Objects are placed along a hexagonal grid.

freeform.label: freeform
freeform.tooltip: A loose approach to visual structure.

old-style revival.label: old-style revival
old-style revival.tooltip: Emulates a style from early mapping.

slidershapes.label: slidershapes
slidershapes.tooltip: Uses a variety of slider designs.

distance snapped.label: distance snapped
distance snapped.tooltip: Uses osu's built-in distance snap feature.

iNiS-style.label: iNiS-style
iNiS-style.tooltip: Originates from the original DS games.

high contrast.label: high contrast
high contrast.tooltip: Uses flashy ideas to follow music changes.

improvisation.label: improvisation
improvisation.tooltip: Uses patterns that do not directly match the music.

playfield constraint.label: playfield constraint
playfield constraint.tooltip: Restricts object placement to a part of the playfield.

video gimmick.label: video gimmick
video gimmick.tooltip: References the background video in its patterning.

colorhax.label: colorhax
colorhax.tooltip: Intentional use of combo colors for immersion.

complex sv.label: complex sv
complex sv.tooltip: Large changes in slider velocity to test reading.

visually dense.label: visually dense
visually dense.tooltip: Patterns with many visible notes that make reading hard.

sharp aim.label: sharp aim
sharp aim.tooltip: Heavy use of sharp angle movement.

aim control.label: aim control
aim control.tooltip: Features abrupt velocity or direction changes.

bursts.label: bursts
bursts.tooltip: Continuous alternating patterns, typically 9 notes or less.

streams.label: streams
streams.tooltip: Continuous alternating patterns, typically more than 9 notes.

spaced streams.label: spaced streams
spaced streams.tooltip: Streams with large spacing between notes.

mapping contest.label: mapping contest
mapping contest.tooltip: An entry for a mapping contest.

tournament custom.label: tournament custom
tournament custom.tooltip: A custom map for a tournament.

port.label: port
port.tooltip: Originally created for other media then imported.
